text:
Hey I noticed that the documentation for Engagements is incorrect since its using v1 of the API endpoint which is not working..from what i can pull only v2 is working for me <https://api.hubapi.com/engagements/v2/engagements> over <https://api.hubapi.com/engagements/v1/engagements>.
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/engagements/create_engagement>
